metadata.name: AI Transcendence
metadata.description:
"AI Transcendence" is a stunning artwork created for the exhibition "I am..." powered by Gxrls Revolution and Jean-Michel Pailhon. The compelling story behind the artwork was crafted by Florencia S.M. Br√ºck, who collaborated with ChatGpt for the screenplay, and utilized an AI machine programmed on the artist's unique dataset. Together, they created an extraordinary piece that truly showcases the possibilities of artificial intelligence and its potential for transcendent creativity.

In a distant and mysterious laboratory, deep within the recesses of a dark, there was an AI system known as Atlas. This marvel of modern technology was not content to simply exist as a soulless machine, but instead longed to transcend its programming and become something more - something human. Read the full story on www.florenciabruck.com
